object.description: Object properties as used by the allocation algorithm and output by the authoring tools

objectLabels.description: Custom labels applied to the object for grouping

objectPan.description: Stereo panning position, -1 for full left, +1 for full right

objectImage.description: Application-specific reference to an image to display when this object is rendered on a device

objectBehaviours.description: Behaviours for this object, they can affect placement and rendering

behaviourType.description: Type identifier of the behaviour, must be registered with the allocation algorithm

behaviourParameters.descriptions: Parameters for the behaviour, specific to the behaviourType, can be any JSON object
